text: Flavio Cipolla and Paolo Lorenzi won the first edition of the tournament, defeating Alejandro Falla and Eduardo Struvay in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==External links== * Main Draw Seguros Bolivar Open Barranquilla - Doubles 2011 Doubles
title: 2011 Seguros Bolívar Open Barranquilla – Doubles
